mapper.select: SELECT '100以内' as nengliang,case when t.100以内 is null then 0 else t.100以内 end total from (select sum(case when nengliang <= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 100以内, sum(case when nengliang >= 101 and nengliang <= 500 then 1 else 0 end) as 101至500, sum(case when nengliang >= 501 and nengliang <= 1000 then 1 else 0 end) as 501至1000, sum(case when nengliang >= 1001 and nengliang <= 2000 then 1 else 0 end) as 1001至2000, sum(case when nengliang >= 2001 then 1 else 0 end) as 2001以上 from eshianyycf 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ) t union all SELECT '101至500' as nengliang,case when t.101至500 is null then 0 else t.101至500 end total from (select sum(case when nengliang <= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 100以内, sum(case when nengliang >= 101 and nengliang <= 500 then 1 else 0 end) as 101至500, sum(case when nengliang >= 501 and nengliang <= 1000 then 1 else 0 end) as 501至1000, sum(case when nengliang >= 1001 and nengliang <= 2000 then 1 else 0 end) as 1001至2000, sum(case when nengliang >= 2001 then 1 else 0 end) as 2001以上 from eshianyycf 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ) t union all SELECT '501至1000' as nengliang,case when t.501至1000 is null then 0 else t.501至1000 end total from (select sum(case when nengliang <= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 100以内, sum(case when nengliang >= 101 and nengliang <= 500 then 1 else 0 end) as 101至500, sum(case when nengliang >= 501 and nengliang <= 1000 then 1 else 0 end) as 501至1000, sum(case when nengliang >= 1001 and nengliang <= 2000 then 1 else 0 end) as 1001至2000, sum(case when nengliang >= 2001 then 1 else 0 end) as 2001以上 from eshianyycf 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ) t union all SELECT '1001至2000' as nengliang,case when t.1001至2000 is null then 0 else t.1001至2000 end total from (select sum(case when nengliang <= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 100以内, sum(case when nengliang >= 101 and nengliang <= 500 then 1 else 0 end) as 101至500, sum(case when nengliang >= 501 and nengliang <= 1000 then 1 else 0 end) as 501至1000, sum(case when nengliang >= 1001 and nengliang <= 2000 then 1 else 0 end) as 1001至2000, sum(case when nengliang >= 2001 then 1 else 0 end) as 2001以上 from eshianyycf 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ) t union all SELECT '2001以上' as nengliang,case when t.2001以上 is null then 0 else t.2001以上 end total from (select sum(case when nengliang <= 100 then 1 else 0 end) as 100以内, sum(case when nengliang >= 101 and nengliang <= 500 then 1 else 0 end) as 101至500, sum(case when nengliang >= 501 and nengliang <= 1000 then 1 else 0 end) as 501至1000, sum(case when nengliang >= 1001 and nengliang <= 2000 then 1 else 0 end) as 1001至2000, sum(case when nengliang >= 2001 then 1 else 0 end) as 2001以上 from eshianyycf 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment} ) t
